items.title: IEEE SPS @ UF — SPS Curriculum & Workshops
items.desc: Jupyter-based workshops connecting analysis, probability, and ML with applied signal processing case studies.

items.title: Audio Fingerprinting (Shazam-style) Analysis
items.desc: Educational tooling and experiments around audio fingerprints, similarity scoring, and robustness to noise and tempo changes.

items.title: Plato’s Cave
items.desc: Agentic system that extracts features from research papers and scores nodes by relevance, similarity, and structure to support reviewers.

items.title: GH05T — EEG Hardware-to-Software Pipeline
items.desc: End-to-end EEG stack (acquisition → streaming → preprocessing → modeling) designed for research iteration and a future product-grade pathway.

items.title: Nano — Robotics Stack (gh05t Interface)
items.desc: Robotics project focused on building a reliable hardware-to-software interface layer for gh05t (instrumentation, control, and real-time data paths).

items.title: Ares — Minimal Fitness Tracker (Speech + Recommendations)
items.desc: Over-simplified fitness UI with speech-driven intent capture and lightweight coaching recommendations for consistency and adherence.

items.title: Sinbad — Wearable Capture & Automation Prototyping
items.desc: Personal R&D prototype exploring wearable capture workflows and automation for content creation, with an emphasis on responsible use and compliance with device policies.
